entry.title: A Python Script to Replace a DOS Batch File Adventure
entry.summary:
Summary

An engineer who turned C++ programmer began an adventure well outside his comfort zone and found Python. The discovery is highlighted while a dos batch script is converted into a much more powerful Python script. Several standard modules that were useful in the script are covered. This retrospective of …
entry.content:
Summary

An engineer who turned C++ programmer began an adventure well outside his comfort zone and found Python. The discovery is highlighted while a dos batch script is converted into a much more powerful Python script. Several standard modules that were useful in the script are covered. This retrospective of one's discovery of Python is very newbie friendly and entertaining for experienced as well.

entry.title: Learn Jupyter Notebook Python by Modeling Your Game Data
entry.summary:
Description

When learning some new technology it usually seems to sink in better if you use a practical example. In this quick demo I show how I took video game data and used it to learn how to use Python Pandas library in a Jupyter Notebook by modeling the StalkMarket …
entry.content:
Description

When learning some new technology it usually seems to sink in better if you use a practical example. In this quick demo I show how I took video game data and used it to learn how to use Python Pandas library in a Jupyter Notebook by modeling the StalkMarket prices of turnips on someone's ACNH Island.

More information for after viewing the presentation:
https://snacktraces.com/pyohio21/

entry.title: Your Python Multi-Tool: Four Built-Ins and a Module
entry.summary:
Description

Your Python Multi-tool: Four built-ins and a module

There are four built-in functions and a module that makeup a "Python Multi-tool".

help, dir, type, id, and inspect

Whether you are new to Python or have years of experience, these five tools are very helpful when learning something new in …
entry.content:
Description

Your Python Multi-tool: Four built-ins and a module

There are four built-in functions and a module that makeup a "Python Multi-tool".

help, dir, type, id, and inspect

Whether you are new to Python or have years of experience, these five tools are very helpful when learning something new in the language. Easy to use and often overlooked for use by tutorials, these are powerful allies that will be (re)introduced to you in this talk.
